tor.desc: Tor (derived from "The Onion Router") is free, open-source software for enabling anonymous communication. It helps users to explore the internet with privacy.
tor.matter_tips: This feature is currently in beta, and may cause issues in some countries.
tor.exit_node_tips: You can choose a custom location that will appear in trackers.
tor.use_tips: When Tor is enabled, the following features will not work properly: VPN, DNS, IPv6 and ADGuard Home.
